Member States participating in the survey. Specific topics requested included physical activity during pregnancy 
(36 countries; 68%); nutrition during the reproductive age (33 countries; 62%), pregnancy (34 countries; 64%), 
lactation/postpartum (33 countries; 62%); and newborn, infant and young child nutrition (27 countries, 51%).
